text: Hojang Taret is a play in the Meitei language' It is based on a play by Euripides called The Phoenician Women. The play is directed by Oasis Sougaijam and produced by The Umbilical Theatre. It is the story of two brothers who fight which causes the destruction of Thebes. The play shows why is fighting is bad. == Notes == == References == Category:Plays Category:Incest in fiction
title: Hojang Taret
